channel.title: product launches on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in product launches on Konigi

item.title: Sling.com Launches
item.description: The video portal I worked on last year went Public Beta today. Check it out at Sling.com. If you have a Sling Box, you can also now view your sling player in a web browser as well (IE/Windows only for now). I guess the rollout of features will be gradual. Can't wait until Clip N Sling is available for Sling Box owners and more social features are released. We designed a number of very interesting interfaces which don't appear to be available yet.
